testcase.name: Create Employee and Benifits
testcase.system-out: Given Login to Plansource Portal............................................passed And Click on Add New Employee...............................................passed When Create Employee with following basic and Contact data:.................passed And User click on Empolyee details Save button..............................passed And User clicks on "New Hire Enrollment"....................................passed And User clicks on "Get Started"............................................passed And User click on Review My Family to fill depeendent details...............passed Then User click on Add Family Member button.................................passed And Enter the dependents basic information with following data:.............passed And User click on Medical Shops Plan and Available Plan.....................passed Then Enroll Employee into Dental Benefits via API...........................passed And Click on Admin and Proceed To Checkout..................................passed
